Main

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    the class for setting and getting the date. Begins on Saturday 1st April 2017. We consider that all months have 30 days (for the sake of simplicity)
    Author:
    natha

      Date()
      instance of date, which is used for history purposes one must not confuse day and currentDay (static), etc.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Date

        public Date()
        instance of date, which is used for history purposes one must not confuse day and currentDay (static), etc. without arguments, the Date is the current Date at the moment you construct the instance
